definition: National People's Congress and Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
to balance an account/accountancy/accounting
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: As you know, there are more than 2,000 journalists from China and abroad covering the NPC and CPPCC sessions.
sentences.chinese: 据我知道，参加两会采访的中外记者有2000多名。

sentences.english: The annual sessions of NPC and CPPCC are just around the corner.
sentences.chinese: 一年一度的全国两会大幕即将开启。

sentences.english: The police usually lock down central Beijing for the duration of the sessions.
sentences.chinese: 在两会期间，警察通常会封锁北京中部。

sentences.english: GT: Will the two sessions this year make a breakthrough in educational equality?
sentences.chinese: 今年的两会会在教育公平方面有所突破么？

sentences.english: Today, in an auspicious and cheerful atmosphere, the Two Sessions concluded successfully.
sentences.chinese: 就在今天，两会在一片祥和欢快的气氛里圆满闭幕了。

sentences.english: During the two meetings, do not feature or sensationalize news about petitioners.
sentences.chinese: 在两会期间不得报道有关请愿者们的消息。

sentences.english: But sex and ­naturism are very separate in my world.
sentences.chinese: 在我的世界中，性和裸体主义是互不相关的两会事儿。

sentences.english: The amendment of the Law has been discussed in the "two sessions" since 2006.
sentences.chinese: 自从2006年两会，环保法的修订被列入议事日程。

sentences.english: The annual sessions of the NPC and CPPCC are just around the corner.
sentences.chinese: 一年一度的全国两会大幕即将开启。

sentences.english: In between the meetings, each stockholder receives biannual reports.
sentences.chinese: 两会之间，每位股东都会收到每年两次的总结报告。

definition: National People's Congress (NPC)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4

definition: abbr. for 全國人大會議|全国人大会议[Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4], National People's Congress (NPC)
party congress (of the Communist Party of China)
the curtain falls/lower the curtain/to come to an end (of a meeting)
CPPCC (Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference)/abbr. of 中國人民政治協商會議|中国人民政治协商会议[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 zhi4 Xie2 shang1 Hui4 yi4]
working report/operating report
general congress/meeting of the whole committee
to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together
conference/symposium/rap session
Papa Xi, nickname for Xi Jinping 習近平|习近平[Xi2 Jin4 ping2]
Davos world economic forum (WEF)
to set the tone
Zhou Xiaochuan (1948-), PRC banker and politician, governor of People's Bank of China 中國人民銀行|中国人民银行[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2] from 2002
national general congress/Communist party national congress, in recent times every five years
pinyin: quan2 guo2 dai4 biao3 da4 hui4

definition: deliberation/pondering/due consideration
buzzword
